```{r}
library(datasets)

dim(iris)

```


```{r}
#unique rows in iris
unique(iris)
# max.length of sepals in iris
max(iris$Sepal.Length)
# min width of petal in iris
min(iris$Petal.Width)
# unique species in iris
unique(iris$Species)



```
